title: 522. No Such Thing As Monet's Bog Cottons
content:
Dan, James, Anna and John Lloyd discuss Orwellian liars, neolithic fires, spicy pillories and dusty lilies.  

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
